name: Integrated Missile Racks
desc: This ship was built for sustained missile support and as such includes built-in storage bays for missile munitions. Increases the ammo capacity of missile weapons by %s. However these storage bays are outdated even by sector standards and as such related missile autoloaders perform %s slower compared to other hulls.
short: Incerases missile weapon ammo. Reduces missile weapon rate of fire.

name: Ancient Missile Racks
desc: The missile storage racks inside this drone are outdated even by sector standards and as such related missile autoloaders perform %s slower compared to standard operation.
short: Reduces missile weapon rate of fire.

name: Ill-Fitted Missile Racks
desc:
The missile loaders aboard this ship are ramshackle, thrown together and cobbled from whatever was available when the hull was being modified.
Missile weapon rate of fire is reduced by %s.
short: Reduces missile weapon rate of fire.

name: Trophy Ship
desc: This ship is an unmodified original model in pristine stock condition that's very rarely seen within the sector today. The pre-Collapse technology within the hull is highly sought-after and is likely to fetch a great price if sold.
short: Rare hull. Significantly incerases base price.

name: Medical Wing
desc: A comprehensive array of medical resources and specialized personnel that allows the treatment of what would otherwise be lethal injuries. Reduces combat and civilian operation casualties by %s. The maintenance of the intricate medical hardware incerases the monthly supply upkeep of the vessel by %s.
short: Reduces crew casualties. Significantly incerases upkeep.

name: Overclocked Assemblies
desc: The manufactory that produces fighter chassis has been pushed to its limits and most components produced have severe defects. Reduces fighter replacement time by %s but increases damage fighters take by %s.
short: Doubles fighter replacement speed. Halves fighter hull.

name: SEx Co. Modification
desc: This ship has been extensively overhauled by the Stinger Explosives Corporation. Ammo capacity of missile weapons are increased by %s and the overall supply cost of maintenance is been reduced by %s.

name: Missile Specialisation
desc:
This ship was designed to provide missile support during extended engagements and significant hull space is dedicated to the storage of munitions. Ammo capacity of missile weapons are increased by %s.
The ship's autoloaders are unable to keep up with the sheer volume of missiles, and as such, all missile weapons have their rate of fire reduced by %s.

name: Arcane Engineering
desc:
This ship was seemingly designed without the level of finesse expected from standard starship engineering. Components of various tech levels are grafted onto the hull without apparent regard for aesthetics, practicality, or even safety. Despite this, the ship does operate. It would seem that Rosalina's designs have a method to their madness, after all.
Increases the monthly maintenance supply cost by %s, crew casualties in combat are increased by %s and maximum combat readiness is reduced by %s.

name: Flux Pumps
desc: Eccentric yet nonetheless functional flux systems increase flux dissipation by %s but %s.

name: Integrated Ammo Feeders
short: Various makeshift assemblies and mechanisms double the effective fire rate of all weapons.

name: Integrated Autofab
short: Ship’s system deploys a random frigate when used.
